sent.orig: I am honoured to have been made CASH Ambassador.
Cash includes cash on hand, cash in bank, and cash equivalents such as liquid, short-term investments.
sent.trans: 现金包括库存现金，银行存款，和现金等价物，例如具有流动性的短期投资。

sent.orig: Put the cash payment into cash box and close the cash drawer.
sent.trans: 将受到的现金放入现金盒中，琐上现金费用抽屉。

sent.orig: Persons receiving cash should make disbursements of cash, record cash transactions.
sent.trans: 收款员必须做好现金支出记录，现金交易记录。

sent.orig: Put cash payment into cash box and cash drawer.
sent.trans: 这笔现金存放在办公室里的零用现金箱或抽屉中。
